Description: Page from photograph album containing views of Egypt and the Middle East: four photographs loose in the album. Each has an annotation on the reverse, two depicting a young girl aged 4 named Biddy. One portrait of Rev. Hughes at his desk. The fourth is a clipping from a newspaper showing Lord Burghley and Miss de Castro.
Producer name: Photographed by: Rev William Percy Hughes
Associated names: Representation of: Rev William Percy Hughes
